actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution notifying the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the Senate.

summary.text: Authorizes appointment of a committee of two Senators by the Presiding Officer to join a similar committee of the House of Representatives to notify the President of the United States that the two Houses of Congress have completed their business of the session and are ready to adjourn unless the President has some further communication to make to them.

titles.title: A resolution notifying the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the Senate.
